reviewText:
I am giving this 3 Stars because I have hearing issues & for me, had difficulty understanding what he was saying, because of his accent.  It would have been helpful if DVD option for captions!!
Otherwise, what I heard deserves 5 Stars.  I liked what heard from Brother Anandamoy & his wittiness.
I would recommend this DVD to those who don't have hearing issues.

This is a fantastic DVD with very deep teachings of Paramahansa Yogananda.
Brother Anandamoy put it simple but it is a very dense and inebriant subject.
Very informative talk about the complex book.
